sect2.title: WHQL
sect2.para: VMDP has passed WHQL certification. See for more information.

sect2.title: SVVP
sect2.para: The SVVP program has validated our VMDP Para-virtualized drivers, so Microsoft customers running copies of Windows Server they have acquired and licensed from Microsoft directly can receive technical support for Windows Server in virtualized environments. See for more information.
